content: etc focusing on it we make the same number of decreases as tens we have on both sides of the band with 8 loops right and left in every 2nd row 4 decreases in row at all and when we finish them we begin to make decreases in each row until the moment when only band loops on the right and left remain on the knitting needles transfer the remaining loops to 2 knitting needles - 8 loops on each we leave the tip of the thread longer and use a loop-to-loop stitch to carefully connect the ribbon into one element with tapestry needle if you ve never knit band toe you can watch this video- tutorial from roxanne richardson youtube channel https //youtu be/l577qhcptm8 si=t8yf0deb2- qxi2bm wet heat treatment tuck in the ends wash the socks with wool detergent or shampoo and block and dry them so that the loops straighten out and the fabric sparkles with new colors the socks are ready
